desc: MarcoPolo Protocol is an open, fully decentralized, chain-to-chain interoperation protocol that enables the interoperability of multiple independently verifiable consensus blockchains without a relay chain. MarcoPolo Protocol expects to construct a future inter-chain-net, which is interoperable and chain-to-chain based. The ecosystem built on MarcoPolo Protocol can provide a solid infrastructure for finance, AI, IoT, traceability, and governance filed by cross-chain communication, privacy computation, shared storage, etc...

1: The interoperability module Gravity has been developed, which realized useable interoperability between third-generation public chains and high consensus digital currency such as BTC and ETH, will share computing power and performance gradually expand to a more high-performance public chain through interoperability.
2: Launch online retail payment application - MarcoPay
3: Independently developed MarcoPolo's mainnet; Launch StandardChain; achieve APoS, on-chain governance, and architecture design of InteractChain
4: The realization of heterogeneous cross-chain operability and resource sharing between chains

desc: The interoperability module Gravity has been developed, which realized useable interoperability between third-generation public chains and high consensus digital currency such as BTC and ETH, will share computing power and performance gradually expand to a more high-performance public chain through interoperability.

info.mTitleB: The Characteristics of MarcoPolo Technical Architecture
info.mTitleD: The Basis for Supporting Peer-to-peer Electronic Cash Payment Applications
info.mTitleE: Application Implementation and Cutting-edge R&D are Equally Important
info.vTitleA: 完成中本聪的点对点现金支付梦想
info.descriptionA: 通过互操作行共享整合全球公链算力，让点对点数字现金支付系统实现支持广泛币种，超高TPS，趋近于0的GAS费和绝对安全。真正成为具有广泛可用性的点对点数字现金支付网络
info.descriptionB: MarcoPolo(MAP) operates and schedules peer-to-peer cash systems cross different public chains through a series of open protocols and components.
info.descriptionC: We invented APoS to support multiple mechanisms to allow all kinds of crypto currencies to participate, while providing generous long term incentive programs for user consensus maintenance, eco-system development and developer recruitment. All of these will be carried out through on-chain governance, to achieve community co-construction, co-management, and win-win situation.
info.descriptionD: MarcoPolo(MAP) provides an open underlying deployment network for the peer-to-peer electronic cash payment applications especially in the fields of Dpayment, DEX, and DeFi, making it easier for developers to implement all basic technology functions and high performance.
info.descriptionE: MAP has developed two applications: Gravity and PoB DAPP. Both apps provide convincing scenarios and traffic as support for developers to contribute to the eco-system.

desc: A rule for multiple composable trigger condition smart contracts.
Provides the ability of one chain to validate the state of another chain under low bandwidth and low storage.
Asset Proof of Staking consensus based on verifiable random function.
A block transportation channel based on IBLT which can compress the block size when relaying blocks.
The underlying support for a variety of cryptocurrencies to participate. It is more open and secure.
It exists in the form of DApp and is to motive members to build the communities collectively.
Encourage the development of applications through on-chain governance mechanism, so that it is equally important as enhancing calculation power.
Attract developers from all over the world to participate through the rewards of on-chain governance.
It has achieved the high-performance interoperability between third-generations public chain and digital currency such as BTC and ETC.
Developed based on Gravity and PoB, encourages consensus builders and maintainers. It is open to all cryptocurrencies
